txt.en: 'Hold, [placeholder]! She is defeated!'
'We need to cover more ground, [placeholder]. If we search different areas of this cavern, we will have a better chance of finding what we seek.'

'Stay your hand, [placeholder], and I will put away my weapon as well.

'Listen to me, Gun Ain! You served Angmar, this we know, and it has gone badly for you since you were cast from your clan. You cannot steal from the Lossoth as you have done; you must find a new home, or you will die here among the ice and the snow. None would mourn you, No-name, if you perished as you are.

'We will do you no more harm. Swear to me that you will leave the lands of the Lossoth and seek an honest living elsewhere. This mercy is yours today. Do not throw it away. If you continue to trouble the people of Forochel, you will find that my heart has exhausted its pity.'
The girl stares at you fiercely, her eyes wild with anger and fear. She shivers in the cold, and her face is thin and drawn. There is a feral air about her, and she seems tense, poised to strike.

'Let us leave this place, [placeholder]. Gun Ain will have to find somewhere to make an honest living, somewhere she will not hinder the Lossoth. She will find a more forgiving place to live, or she will die in this harsh place. Others who served Angmar would not have even that chance.'

'Look at this, [placeholder]! I had no idea such an expansive cavern existed beneath the frozen tundra of Forochel.

'We must be on guard as we make our way through this cavern in search of the screaming shadow that has harried the Lossoth hunters. It has carried away much of their slain prey, and what few tracks I was able to find came to the entrance of this cave before being lost in the shifting snows of this land.

'Do not be dazzled by the reflections in the ice! We must remain alert to all threats while we search the cavern!'
Lothrandir has been defeated
A young girl crouches by a ragged camp-site. Can this be the screaming shadow?
Gun Ain falls to the icy ground, exhausted and defeated
Lothrandir has been defeated
'Leave me!'
You have entered the massive cavern of Kolo-hampât with the Ranger Lothrandir in search of the 'screaming shadow' that has interfered with the Lossoth hunters.
'[placeholder], what have you found?'
'What? You know this woman? How?'
Talk to Lothrandir
'Gun Ain...without name.'
'Do you swear it, Gun Ain?'
'I will leave you this bag of food. It will last until you have begun to remake your life.'
Talk to Lothrandir
Explore the enormous cavern with Lothrandir
Talk to Lothrandir
Find the screaming shadow within the massive cavern
Talk to the mysterious girl
Learn the history of this mysterious girl
Defend yourself from Gun Ain
Lothrandir must not be defeated
'Who are you? What are you doing in this place?'
Listen to Lothrandir make his decision
Lothrandir is in Kolo-hampât, seeking the 'screaming shadow' that has interfered with the Lossoth hunters.
Lothrandir is in Kolo-hampât, waiting to speak with you.
Lothrandir has gone his own way to search the depths of Kolo-hampât, and now you must seek out the mysterious 'screaming shadow' yourself.
'This way, [placeholder]. Stay alert!'
You have found a mysterious girl crouched by a ragged camp-fire in the depths of Kolo-hampât.
'Cross that fissure and continue the search, [placeholder]. I will explore in this direction.'
You have found a mysterious girl crouched by a ragged camp-fire in the depths of Kolo-hampât.
'Look there! We have found the inhabitants of this cave, and they appear quite hungry!'
You have found a mysterious girl crouched by a ragged camp-fire in the depths of Kolo-hampât and must now defend yourself from her.
'I detect something else on the still air. More bears?'
Lothrandir has chosen to spare the life of Gun Ain and is waiting to speak to you.
'These are no bears! How many creatures stalk this cavern?'
'The ice hinders our visibility. What threats may it conceal?'
'You!'
'Look out!'
'You again!'
'Careful, [placeholder]. There is a fissure in the ice ahead.'
'Stay back! My grievance is with [placeholder]!'
'Do you remember?'
'Because of you I was cast out of my home!'
'Because of you my name was taken from me!'
'Keep searching the depths of Kolo-hampât for the mysterious shadow that steals away the prey of the Lossoth hunters.'
'Once I was Avair, but no longer! Now I am Gun Ain!'
'Who are you?'
'I do not want your mercy! A pox on all [placeholder]s and Rangers!'
'It is because of you that I wander! It is because of you that I must steal scraps or starve!'
'This is my home! The only home I have left!'
'I will kill you!'
'Stay back, intruders!'
'I am no one!'
'My people cast me out! There is no place for me in Angmar!'
'They took even my name from me!'
'Now I wander, stealing scraps to survive! All that is left to me is anger!'
Instance: Lothrandir of the Frozen Wastes
